body: The day this shit gets translated I'm gonna spend the entire day nutting to it. I'm gonna go full faggot on those young vampire boys' asses.
Why the FUCK hasn't this been translated yet? Is there a way to crowdfund this?

I think Im a gay
Lmao. The art is so good all femboy doujinshi artist's are soo good at art.
The art is just amazing
Bruh I aint even gay, but I can lie that art quality and story is enthralling though hope there is a translated version out there somewhere or the artist makes a full manga.
I love how the artist puts so much detail into the clothing and the protag's hands and feet. If you didn't absolutely hate feet, you're sure to be curious now.
Trying to piece together what's happening is honestly way harder than I expected. Like yeah I think I get the basics but I feel like I understand the tip of the iceberg
The art is amazing, but it feels so noisy! So many extra elements ( I don't know how else to put it), that we cannot concentrate on the characters themselves

erihan, Jean did not die, everything was fine with him in his solo album (and I'm glad that he did not give up faith, because in the last part he tore off the cross).
However, the main character from Shounen Bathory seems to have died (as I understand it, but I did not understand anything really). But if he is alive, then everything that happens in the current manga is a sequel and not a spin-off. In that case, great!
P.S. - How does the author annoy me with his moral suffering of the characters. Like they do not fuck on their own and in general, they are raped. Despite the excellent quality, the depressing atmosphere and the plot where someone is constantly dying will spend the whole erection
The little brother died?
